note: Leader in the municipal sector. Master of Public Governance. Love working with young people - now for more than 20 years. Lives an unusually ordinary life in the suburbs and has an incredible number of children. Also: Unreasonably fond of tech, gizmos & #IOT, and likes to fill the house with everything possible "helpful" - to the great regret of my very analogue (and very indulgent) wife. She is also a doctor and likes to emphasize that for that reason I can expect to die earlier than average...
